name: brawlObjects
description:
Modified objects used by template Brawl, should be better suited for short games on small maps:
disabled Sanctuaries, external Taverns and Stables,
disabled Redwood Observatories, enabled Covers of Darkness in their place,
Cons have guards from 1-5 to 4-8 griffins, rewards 2-5 Monks, each stack can be upgraded, revisitable after 4 days,
Hives have guards from 1-5 to 4-8 Lizardmen, reward 4-7 Serpent Flies, also revisitable after 4 days and also each stack can be upgraded,
also decreased the sizes and rewards of other banks and made them revisitable after 4 days:
Cyclop Stockpile: 4x 3-6 Orcs and 1 Cyclop, reward: 1-4 all resources and 2-3 Ogres,
Dwarven Treasury: 4x 3-9 dwarfs, 1-2 Pegasi, reward: 1000-2500 Gold, 2-5 Crystals, 1-2 Pegasi or 1 Dendroid/Gold Golem/Diamod Golem,
Imp Cache: 5x 10-20 Imps, reward: 2-4 Mercury, 500-1000 Gold, 4 Gogs/3 Hell Hounds/2 Demons/1 Pit Fiend,
Medusa Stores: 9-14 Medusas total in 5 stacks, reward: 3-4 Sulfur, 1000-1600 Gold, 2-3 Evil Eyes or Medusas,
Naga Bank: 4x 3-6 Gargoyles and 1 Naga, reward: 2-4 Gems, 600-1200 Gold, 5 Dwarfs/5 Gargoyles/2 Medusas/1 Naga,
Crypt: 3x8/2x10/10/10 Skeletons, 2x5/2x5/5/5 Walking Deads, 0/0/3/3 Wights, 0/0/1/2 Vampires, rewards: Treasure class Artifact, 799-999 Gold, 0-2 Wights.
All creatures in each bank that have upgrades, both guards and rewards have a chance of being upgraded.
author: Warzyw647

1.0: cons guard lowered and reward changed to Monks
hives guarded by Lizards and give Serpent Flies
1.01: fixed bug caused by wrong parentheses in griffinConservatory
1.02: added the file with sanctuary ban forgotten in the previous version
1.03: decreased the sizes of other banks
limited each bank to 2 per zone but reverted densities to 100 from 40
1.04: limited version for in branch 1.3 to vcmi 1.3.x and added branch 1.4 for vcmi versions 1.4+
1.05: updated Cover of Darkness and Observatory types for compatibility with 1.4

chinese.name: Brawl模板H3原版平衡修改小物件
chinese.description:
专为Brawl模板定制的为了平衡某些H3原版宝屋奖励过多以及其他一些平衡修改的物件，适用于小型地图（译者注：个人极度不推荐在L以上的地图开启此模组）。
禁用避难所、野外的酒馆和马厩，
禁止随机地图生成红木了望塔，启用黑暗天幕替换。
狮鹫宝屋：5组总数15-30狮鹫守卫，奖励2-5僧侣，
龙蝇宝屋：5组总数15-30蜥蜴人守卫，奖励4-7毒蝇，
独眼宝屋：4队3-6名兽人及1只独眼巨人守卫，奖励1-4份全资源及2-3食人魔，
矮人宝屋：4队3-9名矮人及1-2只飞马守卫，奖励1000-2500金币、2-5水晶、1飞马/枯木卫士/金人/钻石人，
怪物宝屋：5队各10-20小怪物守卫，奖励2-4水银、500-1000金币、4哥革/3地狱犬/2恶鬼/1邪神，
美杜莎宝屋：5队总数9-14美杜莎守卫，奖励3-4硫磺、1000-1600金币、2-3邪眼/美杜莎，
蛇妖宝屋：4队每队3-6只石像鬼及1只蛇女守卫，奖励2-4宝石、600-1200金币、5矮人/5石像鬼/2美杜莎/1蛇女，
墓地：30%概率3队每队8个骷髅兵和2队每队5个行尸守卫，奖励799黄金。
30%概率2队每队10个骷髅兵、2队每队5个行尸、1队3个幽灵守卫，奖励999黄金。
30%概率10个骷髅兵、5个行尸、3个幽灵和1个吸血鬼守卫，奖励999黄金、1个幽灵和1个低级宝物。
10%概率10个骷髅兵、5个行尸、3个幽灵和2个吸血鬼守卫，奖励999黄金、2个幽灵和1个低级宝物。
所有可升级的生物，无论是守卫还是奖励生物，都可能出现升级后的生物。
所有宝屋每4天刷新一次。
